decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Site Plans, no date, no author, received 19.12.2013, Elevations, no references, received 13.11.2013, Birds Eye View Plan, no references, received 15.11.2013, Site Plan (sent via email), no references, received 20.12.2013) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The existing windows formed in the northern elevation of the outbuilding shall within 3 months of this decision be replaced entirely with obscure glazing. The windows shall be fixed to be non-opening. The non-opening side windows shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
Condition : 4 - The green roof of the outbuilding shall be maintained in a clean and tidy fashion to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The detached single storey outbuilding must only be used for a purpose incidental to the enjoyment of the house known as number 7 Airedale Avenue and for no other purpose (e.g. it shall not be used as a self contained bedroom, living room or independent office development).
description: Erection of outbuilding for use as an office
